head.b:skin: body{background-color:#d7d6d6;background-image:url(https://avada.theme-fusion.com/wp-content/plugins/fusion-style-selector/assets/images/patterns/pattern1.png);background-repeat:repeat}.label-info a{background:rgba(10,179,175,.68);color:#fff;font-size:13px;line-height:normal;padding:4px 8px;transition:all .3s}a.post-readmore{float:left;margin-top:5px;border:1px solid #0ab3af;color:#0ab3af;padding:5px 8px}.widget-title{max-height:27px;overflow:hidden;background:#fff;border-bottom:3px solid rgba(236,32,40,.68)}.widget-title h2,.widget-title h3{background:rgba(236,32,40,.68);color:#fff;display:inline-block;font-size:15px;padding:6px 10px 3px 10px;text-transform:uppercase}#fcredit{text-align:center}.label-size{border:1px solid #f2686d;margin:5px;padding:3px 5px;font-size:16px}.label-size a{color:#f2686d}@media only screen and (max-width: 520px) {.uk-navbar-left {display: block}.lnav {justify-content: center;}

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

div.class: post hentry uncustomized-post-template uk-flex uk-flex-middle uk-margin uk-padding-small uk-background-default section
